attributes.action: we need to upgrade our roads to solar roadways
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qlTA3rnpgzU

solar road panels enable sun energy to be captured over the road net work, LED in the panels lights makedynamic  road markings the roads safer, heat pads keep them ice free. pressure sensors can sense hazards. They include side conduits which carry power & broadband cables & deal with storm water,.They are strong and use recycled glass. will create jobs, and give the country a great source of renewable energy.
come on people vote for this technology before we are left behind
